intro: I offer specialized data engineering consulting services to help your business scale. Whether you need a complete ground-up architecture or optimization of existing pipelines, I can help.

services.title: Data Pipeline Design
services.description: End-to-end design and implementation of robust ETL/ELT pipelines using tools like Airflow, dbt, and Spark. I ensure data quality, reliability, and observability are built-in from day one.

services.title: Analytics Platform Setup
services.description: Setting up modern data warehouses (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift) and BI tools to empower your team with actionable insights. From data ingestion to dashboarding.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Auditing and tuning slow queries and expensive data jobs. I help reduce cloud costs and improve data delivery SLAs, often achieving 30-50% cost reductions.

services.title: Cloud Migration
services.description: Seamlessly migrating on-premise databases or legacy systems to the cloud (AWS/GCP). Zero-downtime strategies and secure data transfer protocols.

engagement_models.title: Hourly Consulting
engagement_models.description: Best for ad-hoc troubleshooting, architecture reviews, or mentorship sessions.

engagement_models.title: Fixed-Price Project
engagement_models.description: Ideal for well-defined deliverables like "Setup Data Lake" or "Migrate to Snowflake".

engagement_models.title: Monthly Retainer
engagement_models.description: Ongoing support, maintenance, and incremental improvements for your data platform.
